definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to be evenly matched/to meet one's match
a boneheaded teammate can do you more harm than the most formidable opponent (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 pa4 shen2 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 shou3 , jiu4 pa4 zhu1 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 you3
containing_words.word: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友

sentences.english: He downed his opponent with three blows.
This gives Carlisle a renewed impetus to nail Ripley, his love rival.
sentences.chinese: 这使卡莱尔重新追里普利，他的爱情对手。

sentences.english: It is simply that the tactic should always respond to the rival in the way that astonishes him most.
sentences.chinese: 就是说一个战术应该最大程度地引起对手的惊讶。

sentences.english: The beholder likes to use this ray on any foe it considers a real threat.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔喜欢将此射线用于它认为真正有威胁的对手。

sentences.english: It was Guri who killed the entire board of directors for the rival Ororo Transportation.
sentences.chinese: 是古丽清洗了竞争对手奥罗罗运输公司的整个董事会。

sentences.english: NOTE Data should be compared with those of competitors andor appropriate benchmarks .
sentences.chinese: 数据应该与竞争对手和或适当的基准的数据相比较。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Master Roshi is confronted by an old rival.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，龟仙人又遇到了他的一个老对手。

sentences.english: Thirdly, Trammell was really a good rival.
sentences.chinese: 第三，特拉梅尔是一位可以激发刘翔潜能的对手。

sentences.english: Underestimate Ren at your peril, Ren's competitors say.
sentences.chinese: 竞争对手们说，小看任正非就是在冒险。

sentences.english: He leaves with a record of 39-6 with 30 knockouts .
sentences.chinese: 他留下了创记录的39胜6败，30次击倒对手。

sentences.english: That fellow exulted over a defeated rival.
sentences.chinese: 那家伙因击败对手而得意洋洋。

sentences.english: He keeps his opponents guessing what he would do next.
sentences.chinese: 他使他的对手猜不着他下一步要干什么。

sentences.english: Ambition is alot like love, impatient both of delays and rivals.
sentences.chinese: 壮志雄心和爱情一样，都总是迟到并对对手失去耐心。

sentences.english: The hero beat back ten enemies with his long sword.
sentences.chinese: 那个英雄用他的长剑击退了十个对手。

sentences.english: A company that gets software written faster and better will, all other things being equal, put its competitors out of business.
sentences.chinese: 其他条件相同，软件写的又快又好公司会把对手挤垮。

definition: to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
to lose to (sb)/to be outdone by
